column6:
Peaceful Quite 3 Floor Town Home gated Community with your own parking space.

You have your own PRIVATE Bathroom & Bedroom with GARDEN TUB and a WALKING CLOSET.
Easy access to the Washer and Dryer.

Useful Information:
-Your own key with GATE REMOTE so you can come in and out as you please.
-Parking available with your own space.
-From the Airport: Uber~$40, Supershuttle~$30, Taxi~$50, Bus~$3. All of the options take approximately 35 minutes except for the bus, which takes 2 hours.
column9: Quite Bedroom and Bathroom WALKING CLOSET galleria
